name: South Park Season 21
summary: Comedy Central再次宣布直接续订《南方公园》三季。
info:
• 中文名: 南方公园 第21季
  • 话数: 10
  • 放送开始: 2017年9月13日
  • 官方网站: http://southpark.cc.com/

eps.name: White People Renovating Houses
eps.desc: Randy comes to grips with what it means to be white in today’s society.

eps.name: Put It Down
eps.desc: North Korea takes aim at South Park.

eps.name: Holiday Special
eps.desc: An undeniable bond is formed between a White man and a Native American man.

eps.name: Franchise Prequel
eps.desc: Facebook is the ultimate weapon for Professor Chaos.

eps.name: Hummels & Heroin
eps.desc: Beloved entertainers are being cut down in their prime due to massive overdoses of opiates. Stan is about to be exposed as the source of the illegal drugs.

eps.name: Sons a Witches
eps.desc: At the annual Halloween get together, a witch casts a spell that terrorizes everyone in South Park.

eps.name: Doubling Down
eps.desc: Kyle is playing with fire when he gets in the middle of Cartman and Heidi's relationship.

eps.name: Moss Piglets
eps.desc: Jimmy and Timmy’s experiment could win them first prize in the annual science fair.

eps.name: Super Hard PCness
eps.desc: It’s never been more challenging to be a PC Principal.

eps.name: Splatty Tomato
eps.desc: The children of South Park claim to have seen Mr. Garrison lurking around town. The townspeople are angry that the President is scaring their children.
